title: Messages app main screen is only showing some contact names.
content:
Only certain contacts are showing in the messages app.

On the message list screen, some contacts show up as just a phone number.
When viewing the conversation, only the phone number is listed at the top, however, the image next to their texts has their initials.
When clicking on details, and then their number, it takes me to their fully filled out contact details.
It happens in certain group conversations as well. However, their names are shown above each individual message, but not in the message list or at the top of the conversation.
Contacts that are shown and ones that are not are all saved to the same google account

Things I have tried to solve the issue, none of which worked:
Clearing the messages app cache
Uninstalling messages app updates
Force stopping the messages app
Re-entering contact details
Removing other google accounts from the phone
Forcing stopping the contacts app
Clearing the contacts app cache
How can I fix this issue? This is only a month old phone and it has been like this since I set it up.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
